headline: Beverages, Alcohol, and Tobacco Stocks Q1 Highlights: Philip Morris (NYSE:PM)
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Philip Morris (NYSE:PM) and the best and worst performers in the beverages, alcohol, and tobacco industry.
